CustomField.formula: IF(OR( BEGINS(TEXT(Account.Sales_Segment__c), "Business Sales"), BEGINS(TEXT(Account.Sales_Segment__c), "Inside Sales"), BEGINS(TEXT(Account.Sales_Segment__c), "Parcel"), BEGINS(TEXT(Account.Sales_Segment__c), "eCommerce")), "Business Sales", IF(OR( BEGINS(TEXT(Account.Sales_Segment__c), "Enterprise"), BEGINS(TEXT(Account.Sales_Segment__c), "Federal"), BEGINS(TEXT(Account.Sales_Segment__c), "Financial Services"), BEGINS(TEXT(Account.Sales_Segment__c), "State & Local Government"), BEGINS(TEXT(Account.Sales_Segment__c), "Strategic Accounts"), BEGINS(TEXT(Account.Sales_Segment__c), "Letters and Mail")),"Enterprise & Government","Other" ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Classification is either “Business Sales”, “Enterprise & Government” or “Other”.
CustomField.label: Business Customer Type
